channel.title: New to rsps's
channel.description:
hey Im new to this.. When i log into my server i click to look at the gear iam wearing and the client always freezes both on silab and moparscape... on mopar this is what it says...
Exception in thread "Thread-17" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 64992
at rs.config.ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.jana:190) ar rs.config.ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java.240) at rs.client.drawInterface(client.java:6948) at rs.client.drawTabArea(client.java:1442) at rs.client.drawgameScreen(client.java:6707) at rs.client.processDrawing(client.java:7439) at rs.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:103) at rs.client.run(client.java:3869) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[b]HELP PLEASE? :confused: [/b]

item.title: New to rsps's
item.dc:creator: @Angel_By_eyes Angel By eyes
item.description:
@Angel_By_eyes wrote:

I think its spirit flooded?

Read full topic

item.title: New to rsps's

item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

usman555:

Your not aloud to do requests here. Its just a rule, there are better ways to find things. One of them is the search button.

That was awfully rude sir. Don’t make the community look like a dick anymore than it is ;D

item.title: New to rsps's
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

I am not completely sure about this error but I think it is trying to find a custom sprite for an item that doesn’t exist in the client. If you don’t know a sprite is like what the item looks like I believe. I truly never got into clients to be honest but I thought I would try to help you out and see how far we could get. ;D

A possible solution is to find the client that works for the server “With” all the custom models and sprites.

Read full topic
